name: Pacman Ring
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Play Pac-Man on these new levels! Explore more than 10 different 3D worlds, available in 3 difficulty levels. Try to eat all the pellets and the enemies before you got eaten!

TIPS:

  • Each ghost has his own behavior. Try to understand it to escape from him!

AVAILABLE PLATFORMS:

  • Android
  • Windows
  • Linux
  • Mac OS X

AVAILABLE LANGUAGES:

  • English
  • French
